ingredients.name: Aquavit
ingredients.description: Aquavit is a strong spirit originating in the Nordic countries, at least 37.5% in the alcohol strength department. While caraway is a defining characteristic, the diverse range of botanicals used in aquavit production results in a spirit with a complex and nuanced flavor profile. Aquavit is appreciated for its role in cultural rituals and celebrations, as well as its versatility in various serving contexts.

ingredients.name: Dark Rum
ingredients.description: Dark rum is a type of rum that is aged longer and often in charred barrels, giving it a darker color and a richer, more robust flavor compared to lighter rums. It typically has notes of caramel, molasses, and sometimes spices. Dark rum is commonly used in cocktails, especially those with a strong, flavorful profile, and it is also enjoyed neat or on the rocks. The aging process contributes to the development of complex flavors and a smoother texture.

ingredients.name: Lemon juice
ingredients.description:
Lemon juice is a versatile and essential ingredient in many cocktails, prized for its bright, tart flavor and ability to balance sweetness. Extracted from fresh lemons, this citrus juice adds a refreshing zing and acidity that can elevate and harmonize other flavors in a drink.

In cocktails, lemon juice serves multiple purposes. It provides a crisp, clean finish. Its high acidity also helps to cut through rich or sweet components, creating a more balanced and complex taste experience.


When using lemon juice in cocktails, freshly squeezed is always preferred over bottled versions for its superior flavor and aroma. The amount used can vary greatly depending on the recipe, but even a small quantity can significantly impact the final taste of a drink.

ingredients.name: Cinnamon syrup
ingredients.description:
Simple syrup infused with cinnamon. Follow the recipe to make your own at home:

- 1 cup granulated sugar
- 1 cup water
- 4 cinnamon sticks, broken into large pieces

Bring all ingredients to a boil over medium heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and let simmer for 8-10 minutes until sugar has dissolved, stirring frequently. Remove from heat and let cool. Discard cinnamon sticks, strain into a clean glass jar and cover. Store refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.

ingredients.name: Crème de Cacao (White)
ingredients.description: Crème de Cacao is a sweet liqueur that captures the essence of chocolate in a clear, colorless form. Despite its name, it contains no cream; "crème" refers to its rich, smooth texture. This liqueur is made by macerating cacao beans and vanilla in neutral spirits, then filtering and sweetening the result.

ingredients.name: Maple syrup
ingredients.description: Maple syrup is a syrup made from the sap of maple trees.

ingredients.name: Egg White
ingredients.description: Egg white is the clear liquid part of an egg that surrounds the yolk. It is rich in proteins and is commonly used in cooking and baking for its ability to add structure, foam, and a smooth texture to various dishes.
